name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a proficient Sr. Incident Response Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I excel in incident response, security solutions, and cloud infrastructure management, leveraging my extensive knowledge of **AWS**, **Azure**, and diagnostic tools. I possess robust skills in managing Windows Server environments, Exchange, SQL Server, SharePoint, and Active Directory, allowing for effective GPO and LAPS implementations. My background includes deploying comprehensive backup solutions and disaster recovery strategies, ensuring system resilience and business continuity. With hands-on experience in VMware, Microsoft Hyper-V, and dynamic VPN setups (including **IPsec tunnels**), I am well-versed in networking concepts and endpoint protection. My prior role as a Senior Python Full Stack Developer equipped me with a unique combination of software engineering skills, allowing me to design high-performance applications using **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), frontend frameworks (**Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, **Next.js**), and data management tools (**PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, **MongoDB**), integrating secure, efficient solutions aligned with industry best practices.
